main event: A UFO was reported in Toledo, Ohio on September 8, 1958. One photo was taken of a whitish oval shape against a dark background.
interesting points: The photo shows a white oval shape on a dark background, with no other visible elements.
The time of the sighting is unknown, adding to the mystery of the event.
The report was submitted by the Air Force, adding credibility to the sighting.
The UFO sighting was documented as Case No. 6040 in Project Blue Book, a government UFO investigation program.
Toledo, Ohio has a history of UFO sightings, making this case an interesting addition to the existing reports.
sighted object: whitish oval shape against a dark background
